meanings.definition: A television program in which goods are advertised and sold directly to viewers.
meanings.sent1: I watched a teleshop about kitchen gadgets last night.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought a new blender from a teleshop.
meanings.sent3: The teleshop host tried to sell a magic broom that sweeps by itself!
meanings.sent4: Her living room turned into a teleshop, with products flying off the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The teleshop featured a special offer on colorful socks.

meanings.definition: To purchase goods or services through a television program.
meanings.sent1: I teleshopped for a new phone and it arrived the next day.
meanings.sent2: She loves to teleshop for jewelry late at night.
meanings.sent3: He teleshopped for a pet rock, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Teleshopping transformed her wardrobe in just one day.
meanings.sent5: Teleshopping made buying gifts so convenient.
